initialQuestion.question: Hello, last night you visited the ATC. This is a follow-up message to let you know that we will be in touch to help you over the coming weeks.

endQuestion: It was nice talking to you. I will get in touch soon to continue our conversation. Speak to you then.
questions: How do you feel about your current alcohol use?
What worries do you have about your alcohol use?
What would you like to do about your alcohol use?
What might make you want to reduce your drinking?
How would your life be different if you were to change your drinking?
What do you like and dislike about your drinking habits?

happy: That's great! I'm glad that makes you happy.
What I hear you saying is that is that reducing your alcohol intake will make you happier.
surprised: Ohhh! I understand, I have been in similar situations.
angry: How do you plan to manage your anger better?

family: What I hear you saying is that your drinking affects the time you spend with your family.
friends: How do you think that affects your friends?
finance: How do you think that affects your financial situation?
What impact do you think that has on your financial situation?
health: I hope that your health gets better.
injury: How do you think that affects your body?
